name: Intertech
tag_list: wpf, wcf, silverlight, jsf, java, -net, consulting, training, hibernate, spring, application-development, ajax, agile, wf, linq, sql-server, sharepoint
overview:
Intertech delivers software develompent training and consulting.

Founded in 1991 by local entrepreneur Tom Salonek, Intertech, Inc. has grown from a one-person shop to the largest combined software developer training company and research-supported consulting firm in Minnesota.

Intertech designs and develops software solutions that power Fortune 500 businesses, mid-sized companies, and state government. Intertech works with NASA, Wells Fargo, Lockheed Martin, Microsoft, Intel, and other major companies around the United States helping them learn and use technology.

Intertech’s technical team frequently publishes books in the Intertech Instructor Series through a partnership with Apress in Berkley, California. In addition, Intertech team members are frequently published in magazines, online websites, and are requested to speak at national conferences.

In 2008, 2007, 2005, and 2004 Intertech was chosen from a field of more than 200 as a winner in The Business Journalâ€™s Best Places to Work in Minnesota recognition program. In addition, Intertech has been featured in Fortune, Small Business, Forbes, The Business Journal, Twin Cities Business Monthly, Upsize, Ventures, Star Tribune, Pioneer Press, and Inc.
